title: Release date for new champion after taliyah is..?
body: Yeah any idea on what's next?

replies.body: I think next champ will be announced on 15 July and it will be new support because last supp (Tahm) was released on 9 July 2k15. Tbh Tahm is not true support so it's even more probable

Why do you think July 15th?
And Really do hope it is a support :D
Isn't Taliyah classed as a support?

It's her secondary yes, but she is quite strong enough to make better use of her presence as an offensive laner and people are starting to realize that. Either way, she is mainly a traditional mage meant for the mid lane.
Though she is a pretty good supp, we really just want an actual supp this time. One whose kit can offer a lot of great utility (:
2 months between champ releases, 2 weeks between patches.
Really I knew the patch one - but every 2 months you reckon got a link to proove it?

> [{quoted}](name=187prelude,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=1wExh0MG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-22T21:45:50.746+0000)
>
> Really I knew the patch one - but every 2 months you reckon got a link to proove it?

it varies, but the average is about 2 months.
You can look through the champion release history here - http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/List_of_champions
how about when league first came out lol 3 champs a month though

Yeah. Sometimes Riot does a lot of balance and reworks and what not and new champions don't come out for a while, then other times champions come out in consecutive patches.

Lucian and Jinx were released 1 month apart.

since next patch is minor tweaks and skins, Im assuming next patch is either more substantial balance changes or the Ryze rework, seeing as how they seemingly alternate champs and reworks. after Ryze Im hoping we dont get much mage stuff for a while. Not cause I dont love mages, but because I cant get mid every game and some new bot laners or top laners would be welcome
The new champ name is Kled

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-reveal If you want to see the difference, its every two and a half months, but they will publish it in a month. The next champion is more then likely going to be the one they want to see in the worlds.  So its going to be a high mechanic, high mobility  solo laner. Not sure if it will be top or really any role specific. Tahm Kench happened to be a prime example.{{champion:245}}

well hoping its a high mechanic high utility tank solo laner/jungle cause an interesting tank with lots of versitility is needed, more like poppy but maybe less bursty. either that or a high mobility high mechanically intensive support caster. some cool debuffing mechanics would be cool but seeing the last "unique" debuff (illoai's vessel) is absolute hell to play against Im not sure how much I trust that... maybe a support with a grounded debuff.
It probably will be soon, and it will be rushed and shit just like the last 2
Taliyah is a god, I love her! Aurelion is pretty sweet too, unique play style mechanically, but way over hyped due to Ao Shin.
